title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts to understand the specific needs and constraints of the project.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer, including the data ingestion pipeline, data storage, analytics engine, and user interface components. Define the technologies and frameworks to be used. Ensure that the architecture is modular, scalable, and maintainable. Consider the following aspects: 1) Data ingestion from various sources (network devices, probes, etc.) and formats (logs, metrics, structured and unstructured data, etc.). 2) Efficient and scalable data storage and retrieval mechanisms (e.g., distributed file systems, NoSQL databases). 3) Distributed, fault-tolerant, and high-performance analytics engine (e.g., Apache Spark, Apache Flink). 4) Secure and responsive user interface for data visualization, reporting, and interactive analysis (e.g., React, D3.js). 5) Integration with existing systems and tools (e.g., monitoring, logging, alerting). 6) Comprehensive monitoring, logging, and error handling mechanisms. 7) Deployment and scaling strategies (e.g., containerization, orchestration, auto-scaling). 8) Security considerations (e.g., data encryption, access control, auditing). 9) Performance optimizations and tuning. 10) Documentation and knowledge-sharing mechanisms.

title: Data Ingestion and Processing
description: Implement the data ingestion and processing components to collect and prepare network data for analysis. This may involve integrating with various data sources, data cleaning, and transformation.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer. This may involve setting up databases, data lakes, or other storage systems to store and manage the network data.

title: Analytics Engine Development
description: Develop the analytics engine to perform data analysis and generate insights from the network data. This may involve implementing machine learning models, statistical analysis techniques, and data visualization components.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and implement the user interface for the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer, allowing users to interact with the system, configure settings, and visualize the analysis results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer and its data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute a comprehensive testing strategy to ensure the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer meets the defined requirements and performs as expected. This includes unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment and implement DevOps practices for the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer. This may involve containerization, continuous integration, and continuous deployment pipelines.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the NetworkExperienceAnalyzer, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for end-users and administrators.
